Sentencas: In this study, we developed the low-temperature synthesis of Ba0.5Sr0.5Co0.8Fe0.2O3-delta (BSCF) using barium peroxide (BaO2) and strontium peroxide (SrO2) as starting materials of A-site elements in perovskite.
Titulo: Reactive-sintering of Ba0.5Sr0.5Co0.8Fe0.2O3-δ using alkaline earth peroxides for low-temperature synthesis

Sentencas: The sintered bodies were obtained at a low temperature of 700 degrees C by two approaches.
Titulo: Reactive-sintering of Ba0.5Sr0.5Co0.8Fe0.2O3-δ using alkaline earth peroxides for low-temperature synthesis

Sentencas: One was a two-step sintering process, which included the preparation of fine hexagonal-phase BSCF powders with mean crystallite sizes of 20-30nm by a novel low-temperature solid-state reaction before sintering.
Titulo: Reactive-sintering of Ba0.5Sr0.5Co0.8Fe0.2O3-δ using alkaline earth peroxides for low-temperature synthesis

Sentencas: Another approach was a one-step sintering process using reactive sintering, which is the simultaneous reaction of BSCF synthesis and green body sintering from the starting material powders.
Titulo: Reactive-sintering of Ba0.5Sr0.5Co0.8Fe0.2O3-δ using alkaline earth peroxides for low-temperature synthesis

Sentencas: For the sintered bodies obtained by the one-and two-step sintering processes, the relative density was ca.
Titulo: Reactive-sintering of Ba0.5Sr0.5Co0.8Fe0.2O3-δ using alkaline earth peroxides for low-temperature synthesis
Reactive-sintering of Ba0.5Sr0.5Co0.8Fe0.2O3-δ using alkaline earth peroxides for low-temperature synthesis

Sentencas: The reactive-sintered body of hexagonal-phase BSCF obtained by the one-step process showed higher electrical conductivity of 6.3 S cm(-1) at 500 degrees C than the BSCF sintered bodies obtained by the two-step process (4.1 S cm(-1)).
Titulo: Reactive-sintering of Ba0.5Sr0.5Co0.8Fe0.2O3-δ using alkaline earth peroxides for low-temperature synthesis

Sentencas: Reactive sintering realizes good connectivity among BSCF particles, which enhances the electrical conductivity of porous BSCF bodies.
Titulo: Reactive-sintering of Ba0.5Sr0.5Co0.8Fe0.2O3-δ using alkaline earth peroxides for low-temperature synthesis
